overview: The original ˋThirtiesˋ group of friends comes together one very last time. They head to Finnish Lapland to celebrate Christmas in the snow. Caroline, Bart's girlfriend, has turned out to be the holiday's tour guide. This to Tinne's frustration. Bart mainly tries to mediate between his ex-wife and his new girlfriend. But things are also not going as planned between daughter Louise and plus son Thomas. The young couple is quarrelling and that too threatens to disrupt the Christmas spirit. Alex is looking forward hard to the trip. His Christmas quiz is all set and he is so eager to escape from all the rebuilding stress. After all, he and Elias are in the middle of a tough renovation that is weighing on their relationship. Alex also has something else on his mind: secretly trying to get Saartje and Pieter to grow back together. But they are mainly figuring out how to behave towards each other. Are they friends now or is there still more at play?
tagline: The original ˋThirtiesˋ group of friends comes together one very last time
title: Dertigers kerstspecial
